tutorial.description: Before you donate plasma it is important to understand the plasma donation process, its risks, and your responsibilities as a donor. It is essential for you to review the materials on this page before your first donation. You may complete the review up to two days (48 hours) before your first center visit. If you don't donate within that 48 hours, you will need to review the materials again before you can donate.

sections.name: section_new_donor_video_FE87
sections.caption: New Donor Video
sections.description: This video outlines the importance of donating plasma for patients of plasma-derived therapies, introduces the plasma donation process and what to expect as a donor, and shares your responsibilities as a donor for ensuring the safety of the plasma supply.

sections.name: section_new_donor_video_WITH ALERTS
sections.caption: New Donor Video with alert every 10 seconds
sections.description: This video demonstrates using an alert to the viewer to ensure they are still paying attention

sections.name: section_understand_the_risks_8765
sections.caption: Eligibility Risk - Medical/Drugs/Sexual Contact
sections.description: These documents relate to plasma safety concerns stemming from medication and other drugs and sexual history. Please review them carefully. Later you will be asked about these medications and about your medical history, including possible exposure to sexually transmitted diseases.

Component.name: comp_plasmapheresis_info_7482
Component.caption: View information on Medical/Drugs (with 15 second viewing timer)

Component.name: risk_poster_info_7482
Component.caption: View information on Sexual Contact (no view timer)

sections.name: section_safe_plasma_34DE
sections.caption: Travel History
sections.description: These documents relate to your travel history, including time you may have spent living abroad. Please review them carefully. Later you will be asked related questions that are used to determine donor eligibility.

sections.name: section_compensation_22FE
sections.caption: Compensation
sections.description: When you donate plasma, we offer compensation for your time and effort. Please review the linked document to learn more about our compensation schedule.

sections.name: section_new_donor_ending_DFE4
sections.caption: Thank you for completing this tutorial. Next you will answer a series of questions relating to your health history. The first time you donate you will receive the long form of this questionnaire, and for most returning visits you will receive a short form. It is crucial that you respond to each question accurately. We may review some of your answers during your visit to our plasma center.
